title: minoxpro
author: minoxpro
content: I’m a new member here, and I want to gamble on online casinos. I found some good trusted casinos. And I want to begin with a game with a low budget. First, I need your suggestions about the best games, slots. Live casino for a beginner.Do you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Yes you can be addicted. But you will not be addicted if you are conscious about it. Have a gambling budget and do not go beyond it. Like me my gambling budget is 5% of my weekly income. Let your gambling budget be an amount of money that you can afford to lose. Do not see gambling as a way of making money. You can visit https://livecasino.io and try the fun mode to play some games without using money. Gamble with the games that you will have fun with.You will see some other casinos on gambling board.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMI’m a new member here, and I want to gamble on online casinos. I found some good trusted casinos. And I want to begin with a game with a low budget. First, I need your suggestions about the best games, slots. Live casino for a beginner.Do you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.First, you have to choose a reputable casino to gamble on and only register on them after you have carefully read their terms and conditions of service and agree to their terms as suitable for you,  in selecting a reputable casino,  you can easily notice that through the various ANN threads that we have here in the forum and also checking various forum reviews this way you can discover a lot of things about the casino even before you started playing on them. On the issue of possible addictions,  you have to know that you can only become addicted if you approach gambling with the wrong motive and mindset,  this is because you have to make up your mind not to take gambling as a means of making income,  and only gamble for fun and nothing more than that because doing otherwise will increase your chances of possible addictions.

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: Welcome to Forum first of all, thou you're not longer new here again. You've spent more than 10 days here already and I can see that you are active. I want to believe that you are somehow familiar with the forum rules and ready to abide by them. Going back to your discussion, If you're a beginner in gambling, I would like to recommend starting with a game that is relatively simple and doesn't require a lot of strategy, like slots. But you know that we have many different kinds of slots, so you can choose the one that interests you. However, since you said that you are new, you need to understand that gambling is a form of entertainment and not a way to solve your problems or make easy money. If you start gambling now, you should also to aware of the risks and take steps to protect yourself from addiction because gambling addiction is real.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMI’m a new member here, and I want to gamble on online casinos. I found some good trusted casinos. And I want to begin with a game with a low budget. First, I need your suggestions about the best games, slots. Live casino for a beginner.Do you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.You should assess yourself first on how you can handle risk since not all people can gamble without affecting their daily life. If you are already worried that your real life might be affected even before gambling means you are an overthinker and scared.You can use the demo mode of the casino first to try the games then start to deposit the minimum amount until you get comfortable. The secret on a good gambling experience is to play only what you can afford to lose. Don’t use over budget and just have fun.I recommend slot games from Pragmatic and Play’nGo since they are not high volatile while you can use very low amount for each bet instead of usging live games which typically allow 1$ min bet on card games.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: You are too worried about getting addicted, it takes a lot of time before you get into that deep. But if you are that worried, it will only stress you out and it's best not to try further. It defeats the purpose of gambling as entertainment. Most beginners I think first try that dice game and roulette and after a few days of losing, I'm sure they are also trying out strategies to win as what others are doing.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMI’m a new member here, and I want to gamble on online casinos. I found some good trusted casinos. And I want to begin with a game with a low budget. First, I need your suggestions about the best games, slots. Live casino for a beginner.Do you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.About the being addicted part, it's all up to you. If you think you are a responsible gambler then I don't think you should worry about that. I usually just play in two different casinos. Stake.com and Sportsbet.io. I have not yet tried other gambling sites but I do check on them especially if I see a good UI. About the best games, if you are starting slow and just want to feel the games then try the Originals first. You can bet for as long as 1 satoshi on those games and you can test your seed too if you think it is giving you good results. Original games are Dice, Keno, Plinko, and more. Now if you think you are ready for slots like Pragmatic, Play N' Go, Microgaming, etc.. then you will need to increase your budget since the minimum that I see is $0.01 or $0.1 for other slot providers. Both gambling sites also offer live casinos so I think you will be satisfied with it. They have a broad of games that they offer and the withdrawal fees are also low enough that you can get in and out if you want as long as you are not doing it like a money launderer. You still need to play and wager.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMI’m a new member here, and I want to gamble on online casinos. I found some good trusted casinos. And I want to begin with a game with a low budget. First, I need your suggestions about the best games, slots. Live casino for a beginner.Do you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.Slot games are very easy to understand, so anyone who is a beginner will certainly be able to play slots because this is common.The impact in terms of life depends on how you control it, if it's just for fun then it won't have any impact if you lose and don't have any pressure, but remember don't chase losses in gambling until your money runs out.About the suggestions of some of the best casinos, then choose Rollbit.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMDo you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.The first step in preventng gambling addiction is to get alternative sources of income that meets all your needs such that you will not depend on the money from gambling to survice. As soon as you are not desperate to win, you cannot be addicted to gambling. So, ensure you work on your finances first so you don't gamble under pressure. Another thing you need to put in place is to develop your strategy that includes targets and risk. With this, gambling will not impact you negatively.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Not everyone who tastes gambling ends becoming addicted to it. Actually, a very low percentage of gamblers are addicted. You just have to watch yourself to identify what is happening inside while and after gambling. If you think things are strange with yourself, stop immediately. Don't feed the impulses, so it won't grow stronger, rather it will disappear within time without major negative consequences in your daily life.Gamble for entertainment and don't take results too seriously. Play only with a sum of money you can afford to lose and keep in mind it's not a money making method.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMDo you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.In gambling games you can get addicted, especially with low capital, of course it will not satisfy the game longer with curiosity, you may continue to deposit again without being based on it.You must be able to set a percentage to bet and how many percent every week, when the percentage is up you must stop immediately and never force using real hot money you can be addicted further and have an impact on your life, especially financially.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on November 01, 2023, 04:40:46 PMYes you can be addicted. But you will not be addicted if you are conscious about it. Have a gambling budget and do not go beyond it. Like me my gambling budget is 5% of my weekly income. Let your gambling budget be an amount of money that you can afford to lose. Do not see gambling as a way of making money. You can visit https://livecasino.io and try the fun mode to play some games without using money. Gamble with the games that you will have fun with.You will see some other casinos on gambling board.You are correct that gambling addiction is a real problem since, no matter how you start, you will eventually become dependent on it and, occasionally, you won't be able to enjoy yourself if you don't play. Plus, gambling is one of those habits that is difficult to stop. While I personally don't bet on gambling games, but I can leave my house to watch a live game because I truly enjoy doing so. In fact, as a man, you can't be a complete person if you don't watch a ball. However, I don't play gambling; that's something I have friends who do. Every day there are matches and they feel like they are missing something because they didn't bet.Gambling is a common activity among young people because it benefits them. You can bet with a small amount of money and, with luck, win much more than you initially invested. However, as a man, you must be aware of the maximum amount you would bet on a game. It's quite risky to gamble a large sum of money that you can't afford to lose on a game because that kind of loss could push you towards other things. Instead, you should only bet with money that you can afford to lose.

comments.author: Bitcoin_people
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMI’m a new member here, and I want to gamble on online casinos. I found some good trusted casinos. And I want to begin with a game with a low budget. First, I need your suggestions about the best games, slots. Live casino for a beginner.Do you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.For a new gambler, betting is the most risky and most likely to lose money. Since you are a new person, you should first gain good knowledge about gambling and then decide to gamble. If you find a trusted casino platform then good but I will tell you all the trusted casino platforms on this forum are the best. You can register there if you want and get high bonus, especially Stake.com is currently the best gambling platform. First of all if you play live casino then you can start by betting on different games first if it can be more wrong for you. And if you gamble regularly then you will definitely get addicted to it, so gamble three to four days a week. I think gambling twice a week can keep a person from becoming an addict, and especially when it comes to gambling, everyone gets addicted at some point.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMI’m a new member here, and I want to gamble on online casinos. I found some good trusted casinos. And I want to begin with a game with a low budget. First, I need your suggestions about the best games, slots. Live casino for a beginner.Do you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.First, you need to tell us how much money do you have for gambling. No matter how less money you have, you should make sure to invest small amount in every game so you keep small risks in each game. This habit will always help you in the long run.Secondly, you need to decide for yourself that which gambling game suits you best. The best way is to play every game and also try out sports betting and see which game you feel is more entertaining and fun. I hope you already know the purpose of your gambling. It should not be mainly to earn money but to get entertained and have fun.

Gambling is for leisureWith these kind of beliefs and insights or perspective then there's no way that you would really be able to make face of problems.Also considering with these things.1. Fund management2. Emotion control3. Greed controlYou would really be need up these things along the way ion which you wont really be that making yourself that get addicted.This is where people usually mess up.Speaking about reputable and good sites then you could always choose and make researchof gambling board of this forum or simply checkout on btcgosu or gamblingbro.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMI’m a new member here, and I want to gamble on online casinos. You'd better stop at this point. Otherwise, your wallets will lose weight.Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMI found some good trusted casinos. Even scam casinos look exactly the same as good trusted casinos. Be careful and remember that you can't trust any casino 100%. They can exitscam at any moment.Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMAnd I want to begin with a game with a low budget. Start with low budget games and end with high budget games. This whirlpool is very addictive.Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMFirst, I need your suggestions about the best games, slots. Live casino for a beginner.Fundamentally, the slots are no different, with the caveat of the external design and RTP, which also doesn't change much.Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMDo you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.Without a doubt, this will affect your real life and, of course, the contents of your wallets. More likely negative than positive.Not all people who start gambling become addicted. But people who have not started gambling never become addicted.

comments.author: mkr06
comments.body: It's great that you're asking for advices before getting into online gambling. Gambling can indeed be risky and addictive and it's important to play  with caution.In my opinion, starting with a low budget is a wise choice. Slot games can be a good starting point because they are easy to understand and play. Live casino games can be fun but they often involve more strategy and interaction so you should get a bit of experience first.

comments.author: Dewi Aries
comments.body: Quote from: ajiz138 on November 01, 2023, 05:35:31 PMQuote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMDo you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.In gambling games you can get addicted, especially with low capital, of course it will not satisfy the game longer with curiosity, you may continue to deposit again without being based on it.You must be able to set a percentage to bet and how many percent every week, when the percentage is up you must stop immediately and never force using real hot money you can be addicted further and have an impact on your life, especially financially.I think the small budget for the initial approach to gambling will not be a problem, you just came and you haven't felt the big thrill of a much bigger win, usually everything will start from small things that will at least cure your curiosity in something like gambling maybe. So I think it's too early to say that small capital will make you addicted, because usually addiction will occur when you already feel a big win, although I can't make sure it's entirely true but of course you are quite right because indeed addiction can occur anywhere and with any capital budget, but because you just tried it then maybe your addiction will not be too significant especially if the final result is losing.Exactly, those gamblers should really pay attention about their budget allocation for betting, do not overdo it, because there is no guarantee, do not make gambling opportunities as your main reason why bring large capital because the final result is always uncertain. Putting money that you can be responsible for is better, don't put money for other needs on gambling because it will only cause problems if the final result is not to your liking, because you will never know when you will be lucky, so it's better to always minimize it.

comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMI’m a new member here, and I want to gamble on online casinos. I found some good trusted casinos. And I want to begin with a game with a low budget. First, I need your suggestions about the best games, slots. Live casino for a beginner.Do you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.If you are not sure that you will be able to manage your greed in gambling then I suggest that you never try gambling, gambling is not an easy thing to control if you really want money or use money and hope to win the jackpot as a reason to gamble. However, if you really have a strong intention to become a gambler, you must be able to gamble with full responsibility, don't let yourself become a gambling addict because of excessive curiosity and excessive greed.My advice is that if you want to gamble, choose a type of game that you are good at, such as lottery or sports betting and for online casino gambling sites, only those that have an ann thread on this forum.

comments.author: South Park
comments.body: Quote from: minoxpro on November 01, 2023, 04:36:30 PMI’m a new member here, and I want to gamble on online casinos. I found some good trusted casinos. And I want to begin with a game with a low budget. First, I need your suggestions about the best games, slots. Live casino for a beginner.Do you think Me starting gambling would effect me in my real life or make me addicted to gambling. What’s you suggestion and advices.Whenever I read about the best games a gambler can play from a newbie I cringe a little bit, as this makes me think that you are not trying to gamble just for the entertainment value you can get out of it but instead you are trying to obtain profits by gambling, and I think like this because if that was not the case then the best games for you will simply be the ones you like, then you need to be extremely careful as you may be starting your journey with the wrong foot.
